Detailed Description

Main window class.

Tonatiuh's main window class. It includes the menu bars and all the actions, signals and slots to provide user interaction with the program.

double  seconds,
double  latitude,
double  longitude 
) [slot]

Sets the sun position for the localitation given by latitude and longitude coordinates. Latitude is positive for North and positive longitude for east. The time defined by year, month and day, hours, minustes and seconds is ut time.
